name: MM Garden
description:
Alice in the dream, wake up to become a robot, how can we wake up from a good dream and find ourselves?

This game, with boundless creativity and ideas, explores the brain in the vat of dreams and reality from a philosophical perspective.

It has ancient oriental Zen and cyberpunk crossover elements.

Action, adventure, explore together!

Features:

1、you are born in a garden,the dream start.
2、you can move around the garden to explore the secret.Find Hidden items.
3、Through the explore,you can move jump to anywhere of this secret place.
4、When you walked around this beautiful place,you can see the beautiful view.
5、You can feel the Zen and the Peaceful.That's why our game born.
6、Cure your break heart of reality,find real self in this hidden garden.
